parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> ofp

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Waypoints

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Returns [[Position]] of the given waypoint. <br><br>
<template lineStart="1"><title>Feature </title><part><name index="1"/><value> Informative </value></part><part><name index="2"/><value> This command is identical to [[getWPPos]]</value></part></template>

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> '''waypointPosition''' waypoint

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> waypoint: [[Array]] - format [[Waypoint]]

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Array]] - format [[PositionAGL]]
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_wPos = [[waypointPosition]] [_groupOne, 1];</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[waypoints]], [[setWaypointPosition]], [[waypointHousePosition]], [[setWPPos]]
</value></part></template>
